description: Updates an existing backend storage resource.

parameters.name: BackendEnvironmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment.

parameters.name: ResourceConfig
parameters.description: The resource configuration for updating backend storage. The authorization configuration for the storage S3 bucket. Lists all authenticated user read, write, and delete permissions for your S3 bucket. (string) --- UnAuthenticated (list) --- Lists all unauthenticated user read, write, and delete permissions for your S3 bucket. (string) --- The name of the storage service.

nested_params.name: Permissions
nested_params.description: The authorization configuration for the storage S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: Authenticated
nested_params.description: Lists all authenticated user read, write, and delete permissions for your S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: UnAuthenticated
nested_params.description: Lists all unauthenticated user read, write, and delete permissions for your S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: ServiceName
nested_params.description: The name of the storage service.

parameters.name: ResourceName
parameters.description: The name of the storage resource.

nested_items.name: BackendEnvironmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the backend environment.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the request.
